## Business Analyst Services - Un Availability Notice
### [Title in French] Services d'Analyste des activités

#### Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-747-43545519
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004957
* **Publication Date**: February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 12, 2024 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: March 12, 2024

#### Supply Requirements
* The requirement is open solely to qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders.
* The requested services include Level 3 Business Analyst for the National Capital Region.

#### Commercial Information
* **Trade Agreements**: The solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other trade agreements listed below.
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be considered.

#### Contract Terms
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Jean Francois Guilmeus, jean-francois.guilmeus@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, (343) 630-0762

#### Related Documents
* The solicitation and amendment documents are available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31889/30004957-npp---amd-3.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31889/30004957-npp---amd-1.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31889/30004957-npp.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31889/30004957-npp---amd-2.pdf)
